name: You Can Only Exist Here
description:
For the 5-Years-O-Bitsy Jam (#AllTheThemes #Daydream #OneRoom) using #bitsy.

Literally threw this together in an hour based loosely on a random daydream and shower thoughts. I didn't want to miss an opportunity to participate in celebrating 5 years of bitsy!

Hope everyone is doing well and continues making amazing things!

Please check out my other games:
https://randomdooodle.itch.io/gravity-guard (I had a lot more time to work on that one!)

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Keyboard controls: Use WASD or arrow keys to move 
  • Touch Controls: swipe in the direction you wish to move

Thanks to:

  •  #bitsysavior and #multicolorbitsy for making my life easier
  •  #beepbox for letting me throw together this "music" for the game
  •  #bitsymuseui allowing easy application of the "music"
